markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Transpose](/Feats.aspx?ID=2926) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 71 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

You switch places with your eidolon. You each teleport to the other's position.

**Special** This feat has the trait matching your eidolon's tradition ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), or [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)).
name: Transpose
